name: Match Group, Inc.
description: Match Group, Inc. is a global leader in the online dating industry, connecting millions of people through its portfolio of dating applications and websites. Founded in 2009 and headquartered in Dallas, Texas, Match Group operates several well-known brands including Tinder, Match.com, OkCupid, and Plenty of Fish. The company focuses on fostering relationships and helping users find meaningful connections through innovative features and technology. Tinder, one of its flagship products, revolutionized dating with its swipe mechanism, allowing users to quickly match with potential partners. Match Group emphasizes user safety and security, providing various tools and resources to ensure a positive experience for its users. The company's mission is to empower people to find love and companionship, recognizing that relationships play a significant role in individual happiness. As a publicly traded company, Match Group continues to grow, expanding its offerings and exploring new markets. The organization is committed to diversity and inclusion, ensuring that its platforms cater to a wide range of audiences.

seo.meta_description: Explore Match Group, Inc., the premier online dating service provider with popular brands like Tinder and Match.com. Discover how Match Group connects people worldwide.

faq.answer: Bernard Kim is the CEO of Match Group, Inc.

faq.answer: Match Group is headquartered in Dallas, Texas, USA.

faq.answer: Match Group's main products include Tinder, Match.com, OkCupid, and Plenty of Fish.
